patthana16.50:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.50:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto
patthana16.50:2.1_1: ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
